data.actual_result: These specific detailed info don't have a white font color.
data.expected_result: White font color for specific info in audit log entry details should be shown (e.g. the new nickname when changing the nickname).
data.short_description: Missing white font color for some info in Audit Log entry details
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you have the permission to view the Audit Log - Do any action that causes an Audit Log entry with a bold white detailed info (such as adding a role or changing nickname) - Open Server Settings -> Audit Log - Search for this Audit Log entry and expand it - Observe the detailed info of it
